isis.stitle: Electrical System Troubleshooting Guide - BE 200, CE 200, CE 300 Model - ELECTRICAL SYSTEM CONTROLLER AND SWITCH PACKS - SWITCH PACK MODULES - SWITCH AND BULB REPLACEMENT

svcsubproc.title: L.E.D. Bulb Replacement

warning.para: Turn off ignition switch to prevent damage to components or personal injury.

figure.caption: "Twelve Pack" Switch Module with L.E.D. bulbs and Switches

note.para: The upper bulb socket is a dual-purpose socket. That is, it will accept both backlighting (yellow) bulbs and "ON" indication type (green) bulbs. All upper positions of the switch modules are outfitted this way. There is no specific position that accepts one but not the other. The bottom bulbs are always yellow for backlighting. The bulb apertures are asymmetrical and bulbs are keyed to be inserted into the circuit board in only one orientation.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Back Side Of Panel.

If the bulb will not insert into the circuit board rotate the bulb one-half turn and try again. Do not force the bulb into the board. Use a wide blade flat screwdriver or a coin to lock the bulb into place with a short clockwise rotation. Do not overtighten the socket. To gain access to the bulbs, carefully remove the snap in the rear corner of the switch assembly.

For switches with indication of "ON" the bulbs are colored green and yellow. Install the green bulb in the upper section of the switch on the printed circuit card. Install the yellow bottom section corresponding to the position that this switch is installed.
Install yellow bulbs in both upper and lower sections on the printed circuit board corresponding to the position that this switch is installed.

svcsubproc.title: Switch or Blank Replacement

warning.para: Turn Off the ignition switch to prevent damage to components or personal injury.

caution.para: There is very little clearance for the switch / blank tabs between the module and the circuit board. Use caution to avoid breaking off the tabs.

svcsubproc.para: To remove switch/blank from Switch Module squeeze the tabs toward each other and push the switch/blank out the front.

svcsubproc.title: Switch/Blank Installation
svcsubproc.para: All switches/blanks are indexed and can only be installed in one orientation.
Refer to Switch Blank Showing Indexing Key.
Slide the switch or blank into the module until the tabs lock in place.
Reinstall switch module in Instrument Panel.
